# selectionIndexPaths

**Instance Property**

An array containing the index paths of the currently selected objects.

## Declaration

```swift
var selectionIndexPaths: [IndexPath] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains an array containing [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexPath] objects for each of the selected objects in the tree controller’s content. This property is observable using key-value observing.

## Getting the current selection

- **setSelectionIndexPath(_:)**: Sets the tree controller’s current selection.
- **selectionIndexPath**: The index path of the first selected object.
- **setSelectionIndexPaths(_:)**: Sets the tree controller’s current selection to the specified index paths.
- **selectedObjects**: An array containing the currently selected objects in the tree controller’s content.
- **selectedNodes**: An array containing the tree controller’s selected tree nodes.
